3.3 DUIM-Extended-Geometry Module

rectangle-min-position

Generic function

Summary

Returns the x and y coordinates of the left top of the rectangle.

Signature

rectangle-min-position rectangle => x1 y1

Arguments

rectangle
An instance of type <rectangle>.

Values

x1
An instance of type <real>.

y1
An instance of type <real>.

Library

duim-extended-geometry

Module

duim-extended-geometry

Description

Returns the x and y coordinates of the left top of the rectangle.

See also

<rectangle>, page 103

rectangle?, page 104

rectangle-edges, page 105

rectangle-height, page 106

rectangle-max-point, page 107

rectangle-max-position, page 108

rectangle-min-point, page 109

rectangle-size, page 111

rectangle-width, page 112
